Package jeco.core.util.bnf

Class BnfReader

java.lang.Object
jeco.core.util.bnf.BnfReader
public class BnfReader extends Object
Class to read a BNF grammar from a file.

    • isInfinitlyRecursive

      public boolean isInfinitlyRecursive(Rule startRule) throws Exception
      Check if a rule is infinitely recursive.
      Parameters:
      startRule - Rule to check.
      Returns:
      True if the rule is infinitely recursive, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception - If no rule is found for a symbol.
